sentences.en: a barbed comment on his appearance
At dawn we broke through the barbed wire entanglements under the city wall.
sentences.cn: 拂晓我们突破了城墙的铁丝网.

sentences.en: Beyond the undeviating barbed - wire fences were clumps of golden rod.
sentences.cn: 在一排排笔直的,用带刺的铁丝编扎的栅栏那一边,有一丛丛金黄色的秋麒麟草.

sentences.en: His land is fenced with barbed wire.
sentences.cn: 他的田地四周围有带刺的铁丝网.

sentences.en: His property is fenced with barbed wire.
sentences.cn: 他的房地产四周围有带刺的铁丝网。

sentences.en: Hugh and John were exchanging faintly barbed courtesies.
sentences.cn: 休和约翰正说着带有相互挤兑意味的客气话。

sentences.en: Peaceful circulation has been interrupted by barbed wire and concrete blocks.
sentences.cn: 和平流通被铁丝网及混凝土障碍所截断.

sentences.en: Plots of land have been demarcated by barbed wire.
sentences.cn: 一块块土地都用带刺的铁丝网圈了起来。

sentences.en: The barbed wire fence round the perimeter discouraged intruders.
sentences.cn: 周围有铁丝网阻止了外人闯入.

sentences.en: The barbed wire had lacerated her arm.
sentences.cn: 铁丝网刮破了她的手臂.

sentences.en: The barbed wire had left only the tiniest nick just below my right eye.
sentences.cn: 带刺铁丝网在我的右眼正下方只留了非常小的划痕。

sentences.en: The factory was surrounded by barbed wire.
sentences.cn: 工厂用带刺的铁丝网围着。

sentences.en: The prisoners cut their way through the barbed wire and escaped.
sentences.cn: 囚犯们从铁丝网中开出一条路逃跑了.

sentences.en: We savored the barbed hits in his reply.
sentences.cn: 我们很欣赏他在回答中使用的带刺的俏皮话.

sentences.en: You could do yourself a mischief on that barbed - wire fence!
sentences.cn: 别碰那道铁丝网,能钩伤你的!

words.tran_cn: 箭头鱼钩等的倒钩；伤人的话

trans.tran_cn: 装有倒钩的，尖刻讥讽的，锋利的
trans.tran_en: a barbed hook or  arrow  has one or more sharp curved points on it
